Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: To determine the incidence of clinically significant adverse events after long - term , fixed - dose , generic highly active antiretroviral therapy ( HAART ) use among HIV - infected individuals in South India , we examined the experiences of 3154 HIV - infected individuals who received a minimum of 3 months of generic HAART between February 1996 and December 2006 at a tertiary HIV care referral center in South India .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| HIV (Human Immunodeficiency Virus) infection |

The paragraph is primarily about studying the incidence of adverse events in HIV-infected individuals after long-term use of HAART (Highly Active Antiretroviral Therapy). Therefore, the only disease entity mentioned in the paragraph is HIV (Human Immunodeficiency Virus) infection.

| HIV (Human Immunodeficiency Virus) infection |

The paragraph mentions "HIV-infected individuals" and "HIV care referral center," both of which clearly refer to individuals with the HIV disease. Therefore, the only disease entity mentioned in the paragraph is HIV (Human Immunodeficiency Virus) infection.
